import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, use } from "react"; import products from "../products"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem ,Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Price : ${product.price} Status : {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
